title: Learn More: Worlds 2017 Missions and Loot

replies.body:
So what happens if we buy the Championship Ashe Golden Chroma (with tokens) but we don't have the skin? Do we still get the chroma for keepsake and only accessible once we actually purchase the Championship Ashe skin? Cheers.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I got the same question， riot reply pls{{sticker:galio-happy}}
You will only get the ward. When you buy championship Ashe, the chroma will be unlocked and ready for use.

Also would like an answer to this ^^ will we have to buy the base championship skin and the base championship Ward skin just to use the chroma? Or will we get the skin and ward for unlocking the chromas through the token system.
Yup, you can get the Chroma now, then buy the skin later in the event, or next year. When you buy the skin, the border/chroma will be ready for you!
I'm not getting any new missions.. I just have the one where I need to complete 4 missions
well i guess i won't be able to do any of the 5 person premade missions then, thanks riot.

Week 5 and 6 master pass quests are so free!  Also, will the chroma be available for RP after the event, or will it be an exclusive chroma?
It is exclusively for whoever purchases the master pass
i'm guessing it's a master pass exclusive, otherwise it wouldn't make sense to even make it only for people who bought the master pass.
When will the worlds skins return to store?
The Worlds Skins returns to store every year before the Group Stage
Leave a comment{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Would love to buy the master pass and spend time on the missions, but university final exams are 3-5 weeks away. And these are very important for if I get into the desired course next year. 

*sigh

Seems like Riot is really testing how much more paid content that isn't skins the game can take before it becomes a complete garbage dump. I'm still waiting for when missions will be more than a tool for promoting the paid content Riot releases. Guess we'll never see that, tho.
